cards.title: Nuxt 3 (SSR)
cards.subTitle: A popular framework for creating Vue.js applications, with server-side rendering.

cards.title: Vuetify 3
cards.subTitle: The Material Design CSS framework for fantastic UI/UX.

cards.title: Nitro Server
cards.subTitle: Nuxt 3's Built-in universal server engine with API routing.

cards.title: Pinia Store
cards.subTitle: Intuitive and flexible store for Vue state management.

cards.title: Knex.js
cards.subTitle: The awesome SQL query builder for Postgres, MariaDB & more.

cards.title: Joi Validation
cards.subTitle: The most powerful validation library for Javascript.

benefitsIcons.title: Great Features
benefitsIcons.subTitle: To get you up and running in no time.

cards.title: Mobile-friendly Nav
cards.subTitle: Adjusts to any screen size with nice menus

cards.title: Well Documented
cards.subTitle: Commented code and READMEs for every file

cards.title: Content Security
cards.subTitle: An added layer of security that helps to detect and mitigate certain types of attacks, including Cross Site Scripting (XSS) and data injection.

cards.title: Validated input
cards.subTitle: All input on both the client and server is sanitized & validated using the powerful Joi validation and sanitize-html libraries.

cards.title: User Access List
cards.subTitle: Controls access to all pages and routes based on user role. You can change access rules for any page or server route from a single file.

cards.title: Secure Login
cards.subTitle: Uses server-side JWT to verify login credentials and create secure session tokens.
